      gets the column depending on the queried player

      sets the hand sizes of all players in real-time during initializing game process (pushing and announcing)
      void update()
      updates the language specific components
      private void updateHandColumn​(java.lang.String playerName, int playedCards)
      updates the handColumn by getting the actual hand size, or if not updating a move from this player by dividing the int value from the Label with the now played cards
      void updateNameColumn()
      updates the names of all the other players

    • Method Detail

      • clearPlayedColumn

        public void clearPlayedColumn()
        deletes all displayed moves and re-initialize the playedColumn

      • clearTichuColumn

        public void clearTichuColumn()
        clears the tichuColumn when a new match starts

      • getNodeByRowColumnIndex

        private javafx.scene.Node getNodeByRowColumnIndex​(int row,
                                                  int column)
        returns a node at a given position inside the GridPane got method structure from: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/20825935/javafx-get-node-by-row-and-column
        Parameters:
        row - index of a given node
        column - index of a given node
        Returns:
        node at a given row and column index

      • getPlayerRow

        private int getPlayerRow​(java.lang.String playerName)
        gets the column depending on the queried player
        Parameters:
        playerName - player to which the column belongs
        Returns:
        returns the row index, which belongs to the requested player

      • initHandColumn

        public void initHandColumn​(int handSize)
        sets the hand sizes of all players in real-time during initializing game process (pushing and announcing)
        Parameters:
        handSize - size of the current hand during initial game processes

      • update

        public void update()
        updates the language specific components

      • updateHandColumn

        private void updateHandColumn​(java.lang.String playerName,
                              int playedCards)
        updates the handColumn by getting the actual hand size, or if not updating a move from this player by dividing the int value from the Label with the now played cards
        Parameters:
        playerName - the player whose column needs to be updated
        playedCards - the size of the move he made

      • updateNameColumn

        public void updateNameColumn()
        updates the names of all the other players

      • updatePlayedColumn

        public void updatePlayedColumn​(java.lang.String playerName,
                               java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        updates the playedColumn with the current move and calls updateHandColumn method
        Parameters:
        playerName - player whose CardArea needs to be adjusted
        cards - cards the given player chooses to play

      • updatePlayerName

        void updatePlayerName()
        updates the name of this player

      • updateTichuColumn

        public void updateTichuColumn​(java.lang.String playerName,
                              TichuType tichuType)
        updates the tichuColumn with the announced tichuType
        Parameters:
        playerName - player whose Label needs to be adjusted
        tichuType - the type of tichu the given player announces

      • updateTotalPoints

        public void updateTotalPoints​(int ownScore,
                              int opponentScore)
        updates the scoreColumn
        Parameters:
        ownScore - the current score of the team this instance participates
        opponentScore - the current score of the opponents
